title: WTB- Wadell Portrait w/dark blue color

posts.post_title: WTB- Wadell Portrait w/dark blue color
posts.post_content: Looking to upgrade my current Rube for one that has a rich dark blue background. Slabbed preferred, will pay a premium. Please PM or email me at [url]jlcors11@gmail.com[/url]
You will be looking for a 150 Piedmont or Sweet Caporal for the richest color.

[quote name="sb1" post=1995395]You will be looking for a 150 Piedmont or Sweet Caporal for the richest color.[/QUOTE]

I'm new to this forum and this is why I love it. Such a wealth of information and general courtesy.
